title: 1333 - G7 Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors meeting - Agenda
text:
G7 Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors meeting 
July 17-18, 2019 
Agenda 
 
Wednesday, July 17th 
In the Orangerie 
12:30 - 14:30 
(Working 
lunch) 
Sequence 1. Addressing risks in the global economy and the financial 
system 
Guest: Randal Quarles (Financial Stability Board) 
12:30 – 13:30. Global economy 
            13:30 – 14:30. Cybersecurity in the financial sector and stable coins 
14:45 - 17:45 
Sequence 2. Addressing new challenges 
14:45 – 16:30. International taxation 
16:30 – 17:45. Competition and the digital economy, with Isabelle de 
Silva (Autorité de la concurrence) and Jason Furman (Professor at Harvard) 
 
 
20:00 - 21:30 
Working dinner on international cooperation 
 
Thursday, July 18th 
In the Orangerie 
8:00 - 9:00 
Working breakfast on climate / green finance  
9:15 - 11:15 
 
Sequence 3. Fighting inequalities between and within countries 
Guest: G7 Gender Equality Advisory Council 
9:15 – 10:15. Inequalities within advanced economies 
10:15 – 11:15. Development agenda, with Melinda Gates (Bill & Melinda 
Gates Foundation) 
 
 
 
 
11:30 - 12:30 
Session with stakeholders on gender equality in business and the economy 
12:00 
Press conference
